amendment.description: To require reports on the withdrawal or diversion of equipment from reserve units for support of reserve units being mobilized and other units.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4202 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4202 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) To require reports on the withdrawal or diversion of equipment from reserve units for support of reserve units being mobilized and other units.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4202 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4202 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Cantwell.
